function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of privacy and data security for participants due to online questionnaire administration.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of online survey may lead to low response rate due to survey fatigue and lack of interest.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential breach of anonymity and confidentiality due to technology or human error.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation or false data through unverified social media channels and personal contacts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Physical activity may ameliorate pathological outcomes of upper respiratory tract infections urti , including covid-19, by reducing excessive local inflammation and inducing the secretion of anti-inflammatory cytokines.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical activity can be effective in ameliorating mental well-being and preventing symptoms of mental health disorders such as depression and anxiety.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Examination of changes in physical activity levels during self-quarantine may provide insight into the impact of restrictions on physical activity and its correlation with individual well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Undesirable effects of prolonged quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term detraining due to forced stop of physical activity","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 epidemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through droplet and close contact","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contamination through bodily fluids and transmission through oral or conjunctival routes","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of infectiousness changes over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sensitivity and specificity of biosensors for covid-19 detection","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of rapid and multiplexity in diagnostic tools for covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for rapid spread of covid-19 due to digital revolution and iot advancements.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cyber-security and privacy in tracking apps and wastewater surveillance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of bio-sensors and smart sanitation technology in infrastructure and sanitation products.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through community wastewater","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on wbe as the sole surveillance tool","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low ethics in using wbe","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated wastewater with pathogens","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High demand for the health system and availability of intensive care","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control measures of social protection and economic package","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-boundary and cross-sectoral transmission of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management and treatment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of building information modeling bim and knowledge management km","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital covid-19 contact tracing may compromise equality, privacy, and fairness.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of robotics in covid-19 response introduces new technology risks.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The usage of mobile apps for covid-19 contact tracing presents privacy and trade-off considerations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of a decentralized peer-to-peer system on information systems among apps and phones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper use of bluetooth receivers in public places for contact mapping of infected patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cryptographic protocols without compromising the privacy and ethics of the patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cybersecurity, privacy, and ethics concerns related to digital contact tracing apps for covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misuse of published contact information of infected patients, leading to tracking and identification of patient locations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate containment and mitigation framework for covid-19 due to gaps in wastewater surveillance from the source.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quick and early detection of the disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contamination due to single-use sensors","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate manufacturing capacity to meet sensor demand","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of mobile phone data for disease propagation estimation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Web-based mapping and dissemination of covid-19 information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of biosensors for disease surveillance","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of the urban water cycle and cyber-physical systems may increase the risk of disease transmission through water supply and drainage systems.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spatial-statistical analysis of the covid-19 pandemic may expose unprotected marginalized populations to the risk of stigmatization and discrimination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital twin systems for water and wastewater management may pose a cybersecurity risk, leading to potential sabotage or disruption of critical infrastructure.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decentralized water and wastewater treatment without proper simulation and control measures can lead to the spread of waterborne diseases, including covid-19.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate optimization of treatment plant performance can result in the ineffective removal of pollutants, including emerging pollutants, from the water supply.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of early detection of emerging pollutants in the water supply can pose a health risk to consumers and the environment.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cybersecurity measures in the smart water system may lead to potential hacking and unauthorized access to sensitive data.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring and maintenance of the digital twin system may lead to inaccuracies in the simulation, resulting in suboptimal decision-making and operational inefficiencies.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
